ComicInfo.Title: Poison River - Part 7; Love and Rockets X, Part 5; WWB P3 (Wig Wam Bam, part three)
ComicInfo.Summary:
Poison River - Part 7: At Garza's behest, Ortiz continues his investigation of Peter Rio for supposed subversion even after Isobel withdraws her concocted accusation. Ortiz picks up Luba for questioning but then begins a sexual affair with her. Ricky Boy tells Luba he has a message for Peter but then takes her inside a cab and rapes her. As vengeance for messing with his son, Fermin strangles Isobel after telling her her life is in danger. A sudden shootout occurs and Salas and Garza are shot and killed.
Love and Rockets X, Part 5: Cynthia Walker's big Hollywood party is on as most of the main cast of characters attend. The mixed-race Igor mocks a racist comment made to him and converses about the (non) validity of a Hollywood-made Iggy Pop movie. Scott parties with Fritz and Petra. Mike schmoozes with various Hollywood types. Riri takes to the party while the more wary Maricela is on the receiving end of a cringey conversation with Kristen. El Fontanel and Rex get high before the Love and Rockets band's show starts. Kristen flirts with Sean but is crushed when she catches him in a sexual act with Bambi.
WWB P3 (Wig Wam Bam, part three): An out-of-work Ray turns over the apartment he was locked out of to Danita. But later she worries he won't be committed to her after hearing rumors that Maggie's back in town. Izzy is mysteriously cutting out "Have You Seen Me" sides of milk cartons with Hopey's face on them and putting them on her wall. In another flashback from Maggie and Hopey's younger days, Daffy is left stranded in the sexually abrasive Lois's place as a prank.
